name: game-poc
description: A proof of concept for an HTML5 game with animated sprite character, demonstrating all the core requirements for a responsive, cross-platform game.

scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function copyDir(src,dest){if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});const entries=fs.readdirSync(src,{withFileTypes:true});for(let entry of entries){const srcPath=path.join(src,entry.name);const destPath=path.join(dest,entry.name);if(entry.isDirectory())copyDir(srcPath,destPath);else fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath);}}if(!fs.existsSync('www'))fs.mkdirSync('www');fs.copyFileSync('index.html',path.join('www','index.html'));if(fs.existsSync('js'))copyDir('js','www/js');if(fs.existsSync('lib'))copyDir('lib','www/lib');if(fs.existsSync('assets'))copyDir('assets','www/assets');"
scripts.android:init: npm run build && npx cap add android
scripts.android:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:init:java17: npm run android:init && npm run android:patch-java17
scripts.android:sync:java17: npm run android:sync && npm run android:patch-java17
scripts.android:build: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.android:build-debug: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:build-debug:java17: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npm run android:patch-java17 && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
